info.title: Orbipay-Checkout APIs
info.description: API specification to use the Orbipay-Checkout APIs. This documentation covers the Customer Management, Payment Management and Account Management related APIs.

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to exchange and manage customer information, such as create Customer details.

tags.name: Payment
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs used to capture and manage charges.

tags.name: Funding Account
tags.description:
This section outlines the APIs used to manage funding accounts.A Funding Account is always associated with a Customer. A Customer can have more than one Funding Account linked to their profile.Orbipay Checkout supports the use of the following bank and card accounts:
BankCredit CardDebit Card
Savings AccountVisaVisa
Current AccountMastercardMastercard
Money Market AccountAmerican Express
Discover

tags.name: Merchant Account
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to manage merchant accounts.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Unique client Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: source_type
parameters.description: token- Using Token. direct- Directly from request data

post.description: The Create Customer API is used to register a customer in OrbiPay Checkout.

parameters.name: create_customer_request
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of customer to be created.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier with checkout.

customer_id.description: Customer Id is a unique identifier in the client system for customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_type.description: Account Type indicates the type of a funding account.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

card_cvv_number.description: Card CVV/CVV2 number is conditional and needs to be passed when adding or editing a Card as a funding account.

200.description: Response to Create Customer API is populated with the External Identifiers issued by OrbiPay-Checkout system for the customer and the account(s).

id.description: Id is a unique identifier with checkout.

customer_id.description: Customer Id is a unique identifier in the client system for customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_type.description: Account Type indicates the type of a funding account.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

post.description: This API is used to retrieve a list of funding accounts associated with a customer. The number of funding accounts retrieved can be modified using the initial_records request parameter. The ID_CUSTOMER  is issued by OrbiPay Checkout system.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Unique client Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: CustomerId of the customer in context, for example custexamplef5ptd555f

parameters.name: initial_records
parameters.description: initial count of records to be retrieved, for example 10

200.description: Response to Retrieve Customer's Funding Accounts API is populated with the list funding accounts of a customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier with checkout.

customer_id.description: Customer Id is a unique identifier in the client system for customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_type.description: Account Type indicates the type of a funding account.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

card_cvv_number.description: Card CVV/CVV2 number is conditional and needs to be passed when adding or editing a Card as a funding account.

total_results_count.description: total number of customers available with matching criteria

has_more_results.description: is true if there are more results or pages

query_id.description: used for retreiving previous and next pages

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: starting id of the result in the context, for example 11

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: starting id of the result in the context, for example 20

post.description: The Validate Charge API captures a customerâs funding account information, validates and responds with a token once information generated by Orbipay Checkout system. This token should be used for the Confirm Charge API request.

parameters.name: validate_charge_request
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes for valiadate charge.

order_ref_no.description: Client's order reference number for charge.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

post.description: The Confirm Charge API takes the token_id and process the payment request by initiatingthe debit of funds from the funding account.

parameters.name: confirm_charge_request
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes to Confirm Charge.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_type.description: Account Type indicates the type of a funding account.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

customer_id.description: Customer Id is a unique identifier in the client system for customer.

200.description: Response to Confirm Charge API is populated with the payent confirmation number and the used funding account.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to a payment in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

charge_amount.description:
Amount fields are of format N [9, 2] with . as decimal separator
        (for e.g. 100.20).

charge_amount_currency.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

payment_date.description: payment date should be in mm/dd/yyyy.

post.description: The Retrieve Customer Payments API is used to search for payments. Payments can be retrieved by confirmation number,  status,  or date range.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Unique client Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: CustomerId of the customer in context, for example custexamplef5ptd555f

parameters.name: initial_records
parameters.description: initial count of records to be retrieved, for example 10

parameters.name: retrieve_payments_request
parameters.description: This JSON contains attributes of payments to be filtered on.

from_date.description: date should be in format mm/dd/yyyy

to_date.description: date should be in format mm/dd/yyyy

200.description: Response to Retrieve Customer's Payments API is populated with the list payments of a customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to a payment in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

charge_amount.description:
Amount fields are of format N [9, 2] with . as decimal separator
        (for e.g. 100.20).

parameters.name: CLIENT_ID
parameters.description: Unique client Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

get.description: This API is used to retrieve details associated with a merchant account.

200.description: Response to Retrieve Account API is populated with the merchant account details.

charge_enabled_for.description: 1. card - Charges enabled from card account. 2. bank - Charges enabled from bank account. 3. bank & card - Charges enabled from both bank and card accounts.

capture_address_enabled_for.description: 1. card - Capture Address enabled from card account. 2. bank & card - Capture Address enabled from both bank and card accounts.

template_name.description: client can choose one among available templates

customer_unique_identifier_type.description: 1 for clients who do not maintain customer base. Only offers guest payments, 2 for clients who maintain customer base. And will share customer unique ids publicly, 3 for clients who maintain customer base. But does not share customer unique ids publicly

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in client system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_type.description: Account Type indicates the type of a funding account.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

total_results_count.description: total number of customers available with matching criteria

has_more_results.description: is true if there are more results or pages

query_id.description: used for retreiving previous and next pages

customer_id.description: Customer Id is a unique identifier in the client system for customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to a payment in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

charge_amount.description:
Amount fields are of format N [9, 2] with . as decimal separator
        (for e.g. 100.20).

charge_amount_currency.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

payment_date.description: payment date should be in mm/dd/yyyy.

charge_enabled_for.description: 1. card - Charges enabled from card account. 2. bank - Charges enabled from bank account. 3. bank & card - Charges enabled from both bank and card accounts.

capture_address_enabled_for.description: 1. card - Capture Address enabled from card account. 2. bank & card - Capture Address enabled from both bank and card accounts.

template_name.description: client can choose one among available templates

customer_unique_identifier_type.description: 1 for clients who do not maintain customer base. Only offers guest payments, 2 for clients who maintain customer base. And will share customer unique ids publicly, 3 for clients who maintain customer base. But does not share customer unique ids publicly

tokenId.description: Single time used token for confirm charge or add funding account.

digiSign.description: Generated Digital Signature for data using private key.

order_ref_no.description: Merchant's order reference number for charge.
